seriesJson.title: 1959 Couchiching conference
seriesJson.description: The 31st edition of an annual meeting held in Geneva Park, Ontario. Political matters are discussed, with an emphasis on how they relate to Canada. This edition focuses on "The New Europe."

node.title: A new Europe: A British view
node.description: William D. Clark gives a British view of European progress since World War II and an examination of the reasons behind contemporary British negotiations. John Holmes introduces Clark and offers a Canadian perspective on developments in Europe.
